Text: For those that don\'t download these single file ripsrnrnCUE Splitter is a freeware tool that splits a single big audio file, mostly an album or a compilation, into the relative independent audio tracks, using the informations stored in its associated .CUE file; without decoding/re-encoding the data stream!!rnrnhttp://www.medieval.it/cuesplitter-pc/menu-id-71.html
